1{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleInstances #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Something exists somewhere.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Some
7 ( Some (..),
8   (|?|),
9   orElse, (<||>),
10 ) where
11
12-- | Something exists.
13class Some s where
14    -- | Test something exists.
15    --
16    --   >>> some $ Just "foo"
17    --   True
18    --
19    some :: s a -> Bool
20    some = not . none
21
22    -- | Test something does not exists.
23    --
24    --   >>> none ["foo"]
25    --   False
26    --
27    none :: s a -> Bool
28    none = not . some
29
30    -- | Extract something.
31    thing :: s a -> Maybe a
32
33-- | Just.
34instance Some Maybe where
35    some (Just _)   = True
36    some (Nothing)  = False
37
38    thing = id
39
40-- | Right.
41instance Some (Either a) where
42    some (Right _)  = True
43    some (Left  _)  = False
44
45    thing (Right a) = Just a
46    thing (Left  _) = Nothing
47
48-- | Non-empty list.
49instance Some [] where
50    none = null
51
52    thing (a : _) = Just a
53    thing []      = Nothing
54
55-- | Extract thing or return default thing.
56--
57--   >>> ["foo", "bar"] |?| "baz"
58--   "foo"
59--
60--   >>> [] |?| "baz"
61--   "baz"
62--
63(|?|) :: (Some s) => s a -> a -> a
64(|?|) s a0 = case thing s of
65               Just a  -> a
66               Nothing -> a0
67
68-- Same as ||
69infixr 2 <||>
70infixr 2 `orElse`
71
72-- | Calculate alternatives if prior expression failed.
73orElse :: (Some s) => s a -> s a -> s a
74orElse a b | some a     = a
75           | otherwise  = b
76
77-- | Infix operator for 'orElse'.
78--
79--   >>> Nothing <||> Just "foo" <||> Just "bar"
80--  Just "foo"
81--
82(<||>) :: (Some s) => s a -> s a -> s a
83(<||>) = orElse
84
